options.markdown: This value depends on the number of acknowledgements the producer requires the leader to have received before considering a request complete. Hence, it might be a good idea to keep track of the change in this value to have a more comprehensive view

chart.description: Max lag in terms of number of records. An increasing value means your consumer is not keeping up with producers.
chart.name: Consumer Max Lag Per Consumer

chart.description: This value should not be greater than 0 for long periods of time
chart.name: # Underreplicated Partitions

chart.name: Consumers With Lowest Bytes Consumed Rate

chart.description: Average number of bytes fetched per request per consumer

chart.description: Size of the request queue. A congested request queue will not be able to process incoming or outgoing requests

chart.name: Consumers With Lowest Fetch Rates

chart.name: Consumer Fetch Rate

chart.description: Lag should be proportional to the maximum batch size of a produce request.
chart.name: Replication Lag Between Broker And Leader

chart.description: Number of brokers across clusters. Filter by cluster to get number of brokers on a cluster.

chart.description: Top 10 topics sorted by record sent error rate. The average per-second number of record sends that resulted in errors for a topic
chart.name: Highest Record Sent Error Rate By Topic

G1 Survivor Space
chart.programText:
A = data('jmx_memory.committed', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Survivor Space')).publish(label='A')
B = data('jmx_memory.used', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Survivor Space')).publish(label='B')
C = data('jmx_memory.init', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Survivor Space')).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Filters: plugin:GenericJMX
chart.name: Heap Memory Usage %
chart.programText:
A = data('jmx_memory.committed', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-heap')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('jmx_memory.init', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-heap')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('jmx_memory.max', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-heap')).publish(label='C')
D = data('jmx_memory.used', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-heap')).publish(label='D', enable=False)
F = (D / C * 100).publish(label='F')

chart.description: over past 5 minutes
chart.name: Average Request Latency

chart.description: Average size of incoming messages in bytes
chart.name: Average Message Size
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kafka-bytes-in', extrapolation='last_value').sum().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.kafka-messages-in', extrapolation='last_value').sum().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A/B).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Bytes in per second across all broker in the cluster
chart.name: Bytes/Sec In Per Host

chart.description: Top 5 average time for producers to get response from broker after a send
chart.name: Top Request Latency

chart.description: Average response rate per producer
chart.name: Average Responses Per Minute

chart.description: Time taken by followers of a partition to get data from the leader, median and 99th percentile
chart.name: FetchFollower Total Time

chart.description: Non-Heap memory used percentage over committed
chart.name: Non-Heap Memory Used %
chart.programText:
A = data('jmx_memory.init', filter=filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-nonheap')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('jmx_memory.committed', filter=filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-nonheap')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('jmx_memory.used', filter=filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-nonheap')).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (100*C/B).publish(label='D')
E = (100*A/B).publish(label='E')

chart.description: Shows the trend of byte-out-rate to clients
chart.name: Bytes Out

chart.description: (Available only with SignalFx Agent) Any value greater than 0 indicates that there were no qualified leader among the leaders at a given point in time
chart.name: # Unclean Leader Elections

chart.description: Time taken (in milliseconds) by consumers to get data, median and 99th percentile
chart.name: FetchConsumer Total Time

chart.description: (Available only with SignalFx Agent) If a broker goes down, ISR for some of the partitions will shrink. When that broker is up again, ISR will be expanded once the replicas are fully caught up. Other than that, the expected value for both ISR shrink rate and expansion rate is 0.
chart.name: ISR Shrink vs Expand Delta

chart.description: Average send error rate per producer
chart.name: Record Send Errors Per Minute

chart.description: Shows the trend of byte-in-rate from clients
chart.name: Bytes In

chart.description: per producer
chart.name: Records Sent Per Minute

chart.description: Average per-second number of retried record sends for a topic.
chart.name: Record Retry Rate Per Topic
G1 Eden Space
chart.programText:
A = data('jmx_memory.init', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Eden Space')).publish(label='A')
B = data('jmx_memory.committed', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Eden Space')).publish(label='B')
C = data('jmx_memory.used', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Eden Space')).publish(label='C')

chart.name: G1 Old Gen
chart.programText:
A = data('jmx_memory.init', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Old Gen')).publish(label='A')
C = data('jmx_memory.committed', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Old Gen')).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Lists consumers with lowest number of records consumed per sec
chart.name: Consumers With Lowest Records Consumed Rate

chart.description: Number of fetch requests per second
chart.name: Consumer Fetch Rate Per Consumer

chart.description: (Available only with SignalFx Agent) If a broker goes down, ISR for some of the partitions will shrink. When that broker is up again, ISR will be expanded once the replicas are fully caught up. Other than that, the expected value for both ISR shrink rate and expansion rate is 0.
chart.name: ISR Shrink vs Expand Delta Per Host

chart.description: Identifies consumers having trouble keeping up with producers
chart.name: Consumers With Top Max Lag

chart.description: Number of partitions without leader. Such partitions will be inaccessible
chart.name: # Offline Partitions

chart.description: Average length of time the I/O thread spent waiting for a socket ready for reads or writes
chart.name: Average I/O Wait Time

chart.description: (Only applicable if cluster filter is set) Alert if the aggregated sum across all brokers in the cluster is anything other than 1 because there should be exactly one controller per cluster.
chart.name: # Active Controllers Per Cluster

chart.description: Average bytes per second sent to the broker
chart.name: Outgoing Byte Rate

chart.description: Number of Underreplicated partitions per broker
chart.name: Underreplicated Partitions

chart.description: Maximum lag in messages between the follower and leader replicas in milliseconds
chart.name: Top Brokers with Max Replication Lag

chart.description: Average time for producers to get response from broker after a send
chart.name: Average Request Latency

chart.description: Time taken to send data by producers
chart.name: ProduceRequest Total Time
Code Cache
chart.programText:
A = data('jmx_memory.init', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-Code Cache')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('jmx_memory.committed', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-Code Cache')).publish(label='B')
C = data('jmx_memory.used', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-Code Cache')).publish(label='C')
